channel.title: Posts on FMC-IML-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on FMC-IML-Lab

item.title: Zhang Qiudan
item.description: One paper was accepted to TCSVT: Adaptive Viewpoint Feature Enhancement Based Binocular Stereoscopic Image Saliency Detection. Congratulations to Dr. Qiudan Zhang, Mrs. Xiaotong Xiao!

item.title: Weng Jian
item.description: One paper was accepted to CVPR2022: URetinex-Net: Retinex-based Deep Unfolding Network for Low-light Image Enhancement. Congratulations to Mr. Weng Jian!

item.title: Li Jinlong
item.description: One paper was accepted to TMM2022: Weakly Supervised Semantic Segmentation via Progressive Patch Learning. Congratulations to Mr. Li Jinlong!
